overview: Vera Pavlovna has never been to Saratov. She lived in St. Petersburg and ran a sewing workshop. And in Saratov lived the author of the novel "What to do?" Nikolai Chernyshevsky, who invented Vera Pavlovna and her dreams. This is a film about who and what Chernyshevsky would see in his hometown if he were there today.
title: Vera Pavlovna Has a Dream
